Description +

Experience a true overnight renewal with BioEdge™'s AntiAging Facemask Cream, expertly developed to support and preserve your skin's elasticity as you sleep. This advanced peel-off mask works throughout the night, delivering concentrated hydration and elasticity care.

Powered by a collagen wrapping film, it provides 8 hours of triple-action benefits—elasticity, deep moisture, and a luminous glow. Unlike typical peel-off masks, this formula lifts off smoothly in a single piece, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and renewed.

Crafted with a powerful blend of premium ingredients and cutting-edge Korean skincare innovation, this mask helps reveal noticeably firmer, smoother, and more radiant skin. Just add it to your evening routine for visible overnight transformation and a rejuvenated complexion.

  • Tested to be Low-Irritating
  • No artificial color
  • No artificial fragrance
  • Sustainable Packaging
How to use +

1. After washing your face, apply a generous amountgel to freshly cleansed skin.

2. Finish your skincare routine by spreading an even coat of the wrapping mask across your face. Use a spatula or brush for a smooth glide, and be careful to avoid the eyebrows, hairline, eye area, and lips.

3. Allow the mask to fully dry for approximately 15 minutes, then head to bed.

4. In the morning, gently peel the mask off starting from the edges, or rinse it away with lukewarm water to reveal refreshed, revitalized skin.

Key Ingredients +
  1. Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate)
    Intense hydration plumps the skin and provides fine line care.
  2. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)
    Improves skin texture, minimizes pore visibility, cares for the appearance of fine lines. Helps brighten the skin tone, giving it a radiant glow.
  3. Glycerin
    Hydration, maintains skin barrier, prevents dryness.
  4. Aloe vera extract
    Antioxidant protection, moisturizes, improves skin texture.
  5. Ceramide Np
    Vital for maintaining the skin barrier function, preventing moisture loss, and protecting against environmental damage. Particularly effective at hydrating and caring for dry, damaged skin.
  6. Collagen Extract
    Improves elasticity and hydration, provides line care, and helps promote a youthful-looking complexion.

    Full Ingredients:
    Water, Polyvinyl alcohol, Glycerin, Propylene glycol, Nicotinamide, 2-phenoxyethanol, Xanthan gum, Butanediol, Collagen, Citric acid, Aloe vera extract, Sodium hyaluronate, Hydrogenated castor oil

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, returns, and more.

When will I see results? +

Most users notice a visible difference within 2 hours - smoother texture, radiant glow, and a firmer feel. One mask = up to 7 days of glass-skin confidence

Is it safe for sensitive skin? +

Yes. Our formula is dermatologically tested and free from parabens, sulfates, alcohol, and artificial fragrance. It’s gentle, soothing, and designed with sensitive skin in mind.

Can I wear makeup after using it? +

Absolutely — though most users say they skip it. The mask leaves your skin smooth and plump, creating the perfect canvas (if you want it).

How often should I use the mask? +

We recommend 1–2 times per week for lasting results. For special events or photo days, feel free to use the night before for maximum glow.
